description:
Kiyotaka and Rikyu are recruited for a job at Ueno`s new cafe for Christmas. While they`re preparing, Kiyotaka`s old girlfriend Izumi appears, and asks for his aid. Her request: to break her new fiance`s alibi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas Eve Tears and a Broken Alibi
Larmes de Noël et destruction d’alibi
Seiya no Namida to Alibi Kuzushi
聖夜の涙とアリバイ崩し
